vedal refuses to buy product: Vedal refuses to buy a product for some reason
vedal waants to get product: Vedal shows interest in a product and tries to convince Neuro or Filian to say yes
vedal hints at future: Vedal hints at future upgrades, features, events, etc. Does not count if he's obviously not being serious
vedal crashes out: Vedal gets angry, yells, throws baseless insults, etc
